name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Execution
description: This playbook addresses the incident where malicious PowerShell scripts were executed to gather sensitive information and potentially exfiltrate data.

action--5ac7d582-6e9f-472f-9fc6-e307c7eb.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--5ac7d582-6e9f-472f-9fc6-e307c7eb.description: Terminate any active PowerShell processes associated with the malicious activity.

action--1b1fc915-bc32-4cb7-8480-721534fd.name: Block outbound traffic to suspicious IPs
action--1b1fc915-bc32-4cb7-8480-721534fd.description: Prevent any outbound connections to suspicious IP addresses that may be involved in the attack.

while-condition--b90f9b1a-fc56-40b3-89f8.name: Scan for scripts running in memory
while-condition--b90f9b1a-fc56-40b3-89f8.description: Perform a memory scan to detect any other malicious scripts that may be executing.

action--b90f9b1a-fc56-40b3-89f8-6f828eb9.name: Run memory scan
action--b90f9b1a-fc56-40b3-89f8-6f828eb9.description: Execute the memory scan script to check for any remaining malicious activity in memory.
